pages.text: O-Donkeys/ O-Mules can still carry chests, but they can also be armored. They also protect your livestock from wolves, running them off from your herd(s). $(br2) O-Donkeys and O-Mules can come in as many patterns as horses. However, wild donkeys spawn naturally plain. To get a patterned donkey, youâ€™ll have to breed it over a few generations.

Baby O-Mules can take on the pattern from the horse parent or the donkey parent. $(br2)O-Donkeys come in no breeds, but O-Mules can come in 3 body types: $(br2)Miniature (bred with a Pony parent), Stock (bred with a Stock, Warmblood, or Racer horse parent), Draft (bred with a Draft or Coldblood horse parent)
